quest.name: Bring Your Water to the Slaughter
journal:
Uin Nee hopes to make waves in Lyhe Mheg.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Survey the designated location northeast of Phisor Lran and obtain an icewater undine heart from an icewater undine.
Deliver the icewater undine heart to Uin Nee.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Do you know who I feel sorry for? The children of Amh Araeng. Why? Because water is so precious there, they can barely have enough for a bath, let alone play games like “Dunk the Witch” or “Bismarck's Bluff”!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Luckily for them, I've come up with another one of my ingenious plans! We're going to fill Lyhe Mheg with water!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: That way, the children have the time of their lives, and we pixies will be able to splish and splash to our hearts' content without being pestered by those pesky Fuath.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: All we need is an icewater undine heart. Once I've worked my magic on it, we'll have rivers and waterfalls galore! Naturally, you'll be the one collecting the heart, though I doubt its owner will be too happy to part with it. Don't worry, you probably won't be horribly killed!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Did you manage to steal an icewater undine's heart? Literally, I mean.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Ooh, a fine specimen! With this, we can create all the water we need!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text:
Soon, Lyhe Mheg will be filled with the sounds of children's laughter as they splash and swim and drag each other into the depths, just like the Fuath! It's only a dream, so it's all perfectly safe, unless the rumor about “if you die in your dreams, you die in real life” is true...
I might have to check that at some point, actually.
